data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Felder, Darryl L., Robles, Rafael (2015): Two new species of the genus Lepidophthalmus (Decapoda, Axiidea, Callianassidae) from coastal Pacific waters of Central America. Zootaxa 4020 (3): 431-452, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4020.3.2
